title: Watch, Asian Para Games: Armless archer Sheetal Devi wins gold after completing stunning turnaround
content: Also Read: Archery: How para archer Sheetal Devi embraced who she is to find international successTen, ten, ten! Perfect scores! Devi Sheetal shot six consecutive ten rings in the last two rounds at the final of Women's Ind. Compound and won her first individual gold medal of Asian Games.#Hangzhou #AsianParaGames #HangzhouAsianParaGames #4thAsianParaGames #Hangzhou2022APG… pic.twitter.com/CV40QHpAHm— The 4th Asian Para Games Hangzhou Official (@19thAGofficial) October 27, 2023
author: Scroll Staff
